name: Rover Resume
description: A collection of Rover Resume/CV templates. This list offers a wide range of CV styles that are compatible with PdfTeX, with the exception of the fancy Rover template, which requires XeTeX. This template is a modification of Rover Resume (https://github.com/subidit/rover-resume). Rover Resume by Subidit is licensed under CC BY 4.0.
author: TeXlyre Templates
